contact-subtitle: Our products are unique and tailored to the specifics of each client, and our clients can count on our support and advice at every stage of the process
cooperation-subtitle: InHouse invites interior designers to cooperate with us. We have over 20 years of experience in furniture production: kitchen furniture, living room furniture, office furniture, bathroom furniture
cooperation-subtitle-next: We are also open to collaborating with furniture stores, carpenters, kitchen studios, and advertising agencies
cooperation-subtitle-tel: For more information, contact us at:
materials-description: We make no compromises when choosing materials: only the highest quality
privacy-subtitle1: Your privacy is very important to us. This privacy policy explains what personal data we collect, how we use it, who we share it with, and what your rights are regarding your personal data.
privacy-subtitle2: The administrator of your personal data is Andrei Hurynovich, located at Błażeja 76B, 61-608 Poznań. You can contact us at the e-mail address:
privacy-strong3: 3. What personal data do we collect?
privacy-subtitle3: We may collect the following personal data:
privacy-strong4: How do we collect your personal data?
privacy-subtitle4: We collect personal data directly from you when:
privacy-list2-2: You contact us via the contact form
privacy-strong5: 5. How do we use your personal data?
privacy-subtitle5: Your personal data may be used for the following purposes:
privacy-subtitle6: Your personal data may be shared with:
privacy-list4-1: Entities processing data on our behalf (e.g., IT service providers)
privacy-list4-2: Law enforcement and state authorities, if required by law
privacy-list5-4: Restrict the processing of your personal data
privacy-list5-6: Object to the processing of your personal data
privacy-list5-7: Withdraw your consent to the processing of personal data
privacy-subtitle7-2: To exercise your rights, contact us at the email address:
privacy-subtitle8: We take every effort to ensure your personal data is protected against unauthorized access, loss, destruction, or unauthorized disclosure.
privacy-subtitle9: Our website uses cookies to enhance the user experience. More information about cookies can be found in our Cookie Policy.
privacy-subtitle10: We reserve the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy. All changes will be published on this page.
privacy-subtitle11-1: If you have any questions regarding this privacy policy, please contact us via email:
products-bath-description: Custom solutions for your bathroom! Our furniture combines elegant design and practicality, creating a cozy and functional space.
products-bed-description: Discover elegance and functionality with our bedroom wardrobes that perfectly combine style and practicality.
products-bevel-description: Create the perfect storage space with our cabinets, where every element is designed with precision for your convenience and style.
products-classic-description: Classics that never go out of style. Welcome to a world of magnificence and sophistication, where beauty lives in every detail.
products-corner-description: If you value space, a corner wardrobe is the perfect solution for you.
products-custom-description: Ergonomic and modern solutions that ensure efficient work.
products-german-description: German quality can be affordable. A wide range of models and materials allows you to create a kitchen that perfectly meets your individual needs and preferences. With Nobilia, you get not just a kitchen but a carefully designed space that becomes the heart of your home.
products-hallway-description: Create the perfect storage space with our hallway cabinets, where every detail is designed for your comfort and style.
products-kitchens-description: Modern style, impeccable quality, unparalleled comfort. Dive into the world of innovative solutions with our kitchens, where design meets functionality at the highest level.
products-modern-description: Elegant lines, functionality, and bold solutions in every detail — that's modern kitchens.
products-living-description: Furniture that creates an atmosphere of coziness and calm for your complete relaxation.
products-niche-description: Do you have a free niche? Let's make a wardrobe there. After all, storage space is never redundant.
products-sliding-description: What is the advantage of a sliding door wardrobe? It doesn't take up extra space; the doors simply slide to the side, never sag, and look aesthetically pleasing. Unfortunately, such wardrobes are losing popularity recently.
products-wardrobe-description: You'll never have to think about where to put things again. Your walk-in closet is truly convenient.
products-wardrobes-description: Welcome to the world of innovative storage! Our wardrobes provide you with storage convenience and an elegant appearance, perfect for any interior.
valuation-description: Contact us today to learn more about the cost and process of creating your unique space.
advantage-description1: We will come for measurements with material samples and create a 3D design of your furniture on-site. Free of charge
advantage-description2: The designer is available 24/7 at all stages of the work
advantage-description3: The furniture warranty is 2 years + post-warranty service
form-title: We will develop, evaluate, and advise
form-subtitle: Contact us today to find out more about the price and how to create your unique space
